Lithium 8.5

Lithium is to be our first beta release target. Its aims are to implement the basics of the game, such as a world for the game to take place in, a system for players to create characters and interact with each other and the game world. This documents aim is to define what is to be included in the Lithium release as fully as possible covering design, art, GUI, settings and implementation.

Overview

A simple description of what is included and can be done in the Lithium release.

Major Systems

The main components that are needed for the basic game to function.


Art

The art resources that are to be included in the release.


Setting

All values/setting that are needed for Lithium

Implementation

finalized database, a list of all events that are handled and by which component.
